name: astrodol
title: Astrodol
desc: Astrodol is an elegant landing page template for micro SaaS products built with AstroJS & Skeleton CSS
article: Launch your micro SaaS faster with a high-converting landing page that just works. Built with AstroJS for lightning-fast performance and SEO optimization, this template helps creators like you go from idea to launch in minutes, not days. Fully customizable, zero bloat.
